sub_title: Nurse in training | International public health professional
summary:
Passionate, inspired, life loving professional, wife, mother, friend, and neighbour, making sure every day counts.  

As an independent consultant I want to support your mission by evaluating the performance, impact, and stakeholder accountability of your projects. In addition, I am interested in enabling health systems and communities through capacity development and social and behaviour change communication. 

I am an enthusiastic team player with the ability to lead the implementation of projects in demanding settings towards sustainable impact and demonstrable results. I am also prepared to travel on short notice for short-term assignments and excited about long-term field placements.
